tweets.text: And the tweets are coming thick and fast today! #team7 on Christmas Jumper Day yesterday in Verulab science club showing off their scientific Christmas tree ⁦@VerulamScience⁩ ⁦@verulamschool⁩ #verulamforlife https://t.co/OcXFIFLJK2
Year 11 pupils enjoyed visiting @verulamschool today to see the 6th form in action! https://t.co/wBbVRb5WDF
@verulamschool ’s finest! Absolute pros 👏🏿 https://t.co/vlFynoyBQc

Our last @Verulam6thForm Engaging Minds Lecture of the year #EML22 Thank you to Prison Group Director @ian_bickers for an insightful and thought provoking lecture. Advocating the 🇳🇴🇸🇪 rehabilitation model in face of (some) 🇬🇧 media demands for a retribution model? @verulamschool https://t.co/vHy0GUxogZ

Costumes mean nothing without the talent inside them, but are so important to any production! Sad to see them go! #AChristmasCarol @verulamschool #VerulamForLife #Drama #SchoolDrama https://t.co/tLqGA9MboN
Yet more Letters of Recognition for #team7. So proud of how many of you are showing the core values of excellence, character and respect #verulamforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/vWvlJ3Js1m

Delighted to welcome over 150 primary students for an afternoon showing of our Christmas Production of ‘A Christmas Carol’

Thank you to @MrMacKenzieVer1 and the amazing students for putting on this show. The primary students seemed to love it👏🏻💙

#verulamforlife https://t.co/NwrUfHVDjZ
Backstage Ready 💥 #VerulamForLife #AChristmasCarol https://t.co/B5aOAqUHWx
It’s a wrap!!! @MrMacKenzieVer1 @verulamschool https://t.co/vpLtAzxwyf

There’s a ghost in the house! Our ghost of Christmas Yet To Come thinks that @verulamschool production of A Christmas Carol is in YOUR future! Tickets for tomorrow still available! Who is under that hood? #VerulamForLife #AChristmasCarol https://t.co/c5eQiaODlS
Amazing performance of A Christmas Carol tonight @verulamschool @CharlieRoss99 👏👏👏👏#VerulamForLife https://t.co/qXn6GpzQqd
Christmas jumper day has come to Year 7 to spread some festive cheer! #Christmasjumperday2022 #team7 #verulamforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/4VY5rFtVeH

📚 Have you seen our KS3 Subject Specific Recommended Reading Lists at @verulamschool? If you enjoy Music, have you tried one of these books recommended by our Music Department? 🎹🎻🎷🥁🎸🎤🎶 @MusicVerulam #reading #readingforpleasure https://t.co/NtajseCh3v

It’s showtime! @verulamschool production of ‘A Christmas Carol’ on 7th/8th Dec. Tickets still available. We’ve really pushed the boat out, must be seen!! #creativearts #VerulamForLife https://t.co/RxNY3lFX3S

Over 400 H2s have been issued so far this academic year to pupils using the WotW at school! Word of the Week at @verulamschool wb 5th Dec = Callow. Can you use it in a sentence? #wordoftheweek #WOTW #literacy 📚 https://t.co/el5pvHpE0H
Engaging Minds Lecture #EML22 this week saw the return of @verulamschool @Verulam6thForm 'old boy' Spencer Caminsky of @Shoutout_UK promoting Political Literacy in schools. https://t.co/cPues15Cek
Saturday rehearsal is in full swing @verulamschool #AChristmasCarol #VerulamForLife https://t.co/EUo2oQeT5f
Let the plotting begin #verulamcluedo2022 @MissGPerry B3 please ma’am. There is an important meeting in their for you to attend! https://t.co/tFZasRXl4Q
Revived an old tradition - whole school photo @verulamschool #VerulamForLife https://t.co/bq9aUrWglL

📚 Have you seen our KS3 Subject Specific Recommended Reading Lists at @verulamschool? If you enjoy Maths, have you tried one of these books recommended by our Maths Department? @VerulamMaths ➗🟰➕➖✖️#reading #readingforpleasure https://t.co/8e0EKcDO9N

A fun day @verulamschool in the maths department! @Verulam6thForm learning about moments by making seesaws and year 8 answering the question “did Premier league wages predict finishing league position last season”. Interesting charts produced (with outliers!) #VerulamForLife https://t.co/cyD6cbZBfn
Verulam Staff Reads are up @MrJPTeach #VerulamForLife https://t.co/g104R3zVZH
Great T&L briefing today @Verulearning @verulamschool #VerulamForLife https://t.co/38nHUXIs1D

Well done to the Year 9 football team getting through to the 5th round of the national cup beating JFS Brent 5-1.

0-0 at half time a much better second half performance with goals from Oscar R X2, Joe R, Freddie J and Will S https://t.co/UtjWGKFCx8

Very proud of our students today! Genuinely interested in Scottish National dress. They have such enquiring minds & respectful of all cultures! #StAndrewsDay #Scotland #VerulamForLife 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 https://t.co/y7zMhgIb09
Happy St Andrew’s day from @verulamschool #VerulamForLife https://t.co/bk6649warg

Literacy is integral to progress, hence the WotW to help improve exposure to new vocabulary. Word of the Week at @verulamschool wb 28th Nov = hence. Can you use it in a sentence? #wordoftheweek #WOTW #literacy 📚 https://t.co/gbNcEVdzfc
#Teammaths are on route home! Estimated time of arrival at At Albans Station 5pm @verulamschool https://t.co/pZ31zbqPcF

Great fun with year 7s today “playing with numbers”. Using only the numbers 4,2 and 3 they had to make all the numbers in the square - creativity at its best! @VerulamYear7 @verulamschool #VerulamForLife #CreativeThinkersForLife https://t.co/RYJbsDF8su

Great atmosphere at Verulam school supporting the UN Anti Violence Against Women awareness campaign by 'going orange'. Our wonderful jazz band added to the mood playing for students during the lunch break. https://t.co/XzCiiDimpj

Well done @StAlbansCath for hosting another annual Herts ‘Sixth Form Debate’. Engaging and divided perspectives on Free Speech in society/education/media from Maswood Ahmed @Fox_Claire @libdemdaisy @BimAfolami plus of course the Post-16 students 🗣️ https://t.co/hO5afyRcJ1
Some fantastic attempts so far of our WotW being used! Word of the Week at @verulamschool wb 21st Nov = Liberal. Can you use it in a sentence? #wordoftheweek #WOTW #literacy 📚 https://t.co/RwRKXCkl3A
Well done to student Jack B and former student Elikem💪🏻 https://t.co/ThUMLQi2i5
Great atmosphere ⁦@verulamschool⁩ watching the England game 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 today #VerulamForLife https://t.co/NfCq8gyZLI
OVA Dinner #VerulamForLife 🦌 https://t.co/5bR6Ync1dq
Thank you to all those who donated cakes to our Verulam Children in Need cake sales today - sales were brisk! https://t.co/RDLPxDkVvK

Save the date - 20/05/22 email letstalkaboutboys@verulam.herts.sch.uk to express an interest in delivering a workshop. Tickets available from December 1st vis Eventbrite #LTABoys https://t.co/i31P1gihSl
Lovely to see the ultra crazy and ultra amazing science teachers @verulamschool doing what they always do well - having fun! Miss you guys! @MrKnowlesPhys https://t.co/nyj2SJnjIg

The year 9 boys rugby team lost away in the National Cup yesterday to an incredibly strong Hitchin Boys School. The boys showed great character to keep going and never stopped trying until the final whistle. Each player will receive a blue stag award for resilience. https://t.co/FjJPe2Pehb

There is empirical evidence to suggest learning new words improves literacy! Word of the Week at @verulamschool wb 14th Nov = Empirical. Can you use it in a sentence? #wordoftheweek #WOTW #literacy 📚 https://t.co/GVOEUUMvsE
Odd socks for #OddSocksDay #AntiBullyingWeek ! Let’s celebrate diversity together #inclusiveforlife #verulamforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/UhbPY5Mnbv
Monday night maths for @verulamschool year 11 students was buzzing tonight! 50+ students all working hard on some of the trickier problem solving questions. Impressive!  👏👏 #VerulamForLife
Remember to wear odd socks to show you celebrate diversity for #oddsocksday #AntiBullyingWeek #inclusiveforlife #verulamforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/an87SDOHiZ

Engaging Minds Lecture #EML22 this week saw @verulamschool old boy, Professor @GoodwinMJ delivering a powerful and personal lecture to @Verulam6thForm reflecting on growing up in St Albans, his time at Verulam and how this has influenced his current work with @SMCommission https://t.co/90uQk1tHMY
Happy #WorldKindnessDay If we all did one  kind thing to someone, the world would be a better place ❤ 🌎 https://t.co/GHKBUbnV5u

A community is made vibrant by the different individuals in it. To mark the beginning of #transgenderawarenessweek we would like to celebrate and recognise the transgender clients, friends and allies in our community. Thank you for being with us. https://t.co/ZRrPZ4o8fr

Pupils enjoying topical reads in our canteen with “Restaurant Reads” - this week is remembering those who have fallen in conflict, including a Verulam boy in WW2 👀 one of our whole school #literacy initiatives #LestWeForget #Remembrance thanks @HughRichards #reading https://t.co/yzEbCw0frF

An amazing morning of rugby for the Vs!! Year 7 competed in a Tournament with a variety of schools across the County!

They finished 5th overall with some amazing results👏🏻💙 

Mr Anthony would also like to thank George B & Arthur R-S (Y10) for their help this morning 💪🏻💙 https://t.co/pVg0cTw1l8

Year 9 also hosted Sandringham this morning at the Lane coming out victorious in a 14-7 victory.

#ambassadors 
#verulamforlife https://t.co/ttQzDASCwm

Our @verulamschool KS3 maths club students have been enjoying learning to use @Desmos to create all sorts of wonderful things! Looking forward to next week’s Desmos art!  #CreativeThinkersForLife #VerulamForLife https://t.co/Gw81BgzTB4 https://t.co/SMJUkNWSsz

Looking forward to our conference on educating boys @BoysSchools @verulamschool with our keynote @Positivteacha pls RT @StPaulsSchool @HitchinBoys @RichardHaleScho @WBGSExcellence @SASHerts @St_Ignatius https://t.co/tA5wcTAKQQ

Action packed @bestpracticenet   ECT session @SandringhamSch1 with Catherine Phillips from @Roundwood_Park. Welcoming ECTs from @damealiceowens, @StGeorgesHarpen, @sirjohnlawes, @KWSHarpenden, @BeaumontSchStA, @stags_official,
@verulamschool and @marlboroughsch https://t.co/vJHgZ3lyc5
Very proud of our fantastic, high-achieving, inclusive school ⁦@verulamschool⁩ #VerulamForLife https://t.co/TyLLT6JM2t

Wonderful speaking to staff, pupils and parents @ChilternA this evening with @verulamschool staff, our senior prefects and @dean316austin about our Sixth Form and the @SACFC_Academy and Education Programme😃

What a day! A fantastic Curriculum Enrichment day, a Year 11 information evening whilst also hosting some special visitors @verulamschool - very proud of our pupils and staff. A great day. #VerulamForLife

Lots of photos of our #team7 trip to @MuseumofLondon today for Curriculum Enrichment Day. The boys really enjoyed their first trip as part of @verulamschool #verulamforlife Post 1 https://t.co/NoMbDHwj63

urls.title: Geoff Barton Times Radio | 7 November 2022
urls.description: Geoff Barton, ASCL General Secretary, talks to Times Radio regarding the funding crisis in schools and colleges www.ascl.org.uk

tweets.text: "This isn't about not painting corridors or not buying some textbooks: it's a threat to educational standards": my conversation this morning, alongside @NewmanRC_Head, with @MattChorley @TimesRadio about the ongoing school/college funding crisis: https://t.co/IQ2ZJQmDqB https://t.co/AmGmwlhwoY

This evening we hosted the District Badminton Tournament welcoming a host of schools🏸

Both our U14 and U16 sides were very successful the U14s winning 4/5 and the U16s going unbeaten to lift the trophy. (Captain Younus lifted the trophy) 🏆 https://t.co/M2ycj5EUMr
They’ve finally arrived! Our Blue Stag awards are here! ⁦@verulamschool⁩ #VerulamForLife https://t.co/Kx2g8ArAUr

Make sure you use WotW as an incentive to not only improve your literacy, but also for an H2! Word of the Week at @verulamschool wb 7th Nov = Incentive. Can you use it in a sentence? #wordoftheweek #WOTW #literacy 📚 https://t.co/WSxpGLB3eR
@jrichardson_j @universoulbrand @verulamschool So proud to be part of team Verulam and a great talk to listen on Saturday morning.

Our Year 9s had a busy week with both a National Football fixture and Basketball match.

⚽️Won 5-4 Vs Beaumont (AET) with a last minute winner from Dapo and progress into Round 4 of the national cup.

🏀Lost to a strong Sandringham side in their first league game.

💙💙
Amazing first session for Yr 8 Princes Trust. Team building. Garden project. #hublife 💙💛 https://t.co/jK7LVhLRLm

urls.title: Why we must restore the humanity of Black boys | Kay Adekunle Rufai | TEDxLondon
urls.description: What images do you think of when you see Black boys? In this thought-provoking conversation, photographer, poet and mental health researcher, Kay Adekunle Ru...

tweets.text: So proud to work closely with ⁦@universoulbrand⁩ ⁦@verulamschool⁩ - Check out his Ted Talk about the Smile-ing Boys Project 😁 https://t.co/aVFEjfEaO9

Lovely to welcome back Jonny Watts, an @verulamschool old boy from Class of 2006 to give another @Verulam6thForm Engaging Minds Lecture #EML22 Sharing his journey from a Verulam to the ‘metaverse’ working in recruitment @Meta UK https://t.co/5JzhirOCV6 https://t.co/S2tqgWfDgW

Here are our lates Letter of Recognition winners in assembly today. Noah 7B, Rishank 7C, Evan 7Y, Theo 7Y and Ollie 7C for displaying the @verulamschool core values of Excellence, Character and Respect. #verulamforlife #team7 https://t.co/ga1jk6nLpb

Big thanks to @stgeorgesgovpol who had me to observe Politics A-level today. Great to get an idea of good practice in the run up to being able to offer it to @verulamschool students in September. We looked at voting systems by choosing our favourite celebration! Mine's a galaxy..

Year 13 @verulamschool made Play-Doh representations of God for symbolic religious language. 
Is religious language best understood in terms of analogy or symbol? Think they did brilliantly!
#VerulamForLife https://t.co/c8xcn5AyhX

The first Word of the Week after half term at @verulamschool wb 31st Oct = Tenacious. Some brilliant examples of it being used already! Can you use it in a sentence? #wordoftheweek #WOTW #literacy 📚 https://t.co/sARGif6RQ9
Great whole school staff CPD Safeguarding training session today on DV this afternoon led by Mr Flack @verulamschool #InclusiveForLife #CompassionateForLife #VerulamForLife https://t.co/nGUGXOouHo

Student engagement is key! 

Take a look at @verulamschool's new student newsletter. We love working on engaging documents that inspire and celebrate every pupil. 

#engagement #school #newsletter https://t.co/TlM1OYXCyF
We are aiming for all of our staff and students ⁦@verulamschool⁩ to belong. #VerulamForLife https://t.co/mKF2nVoyWI

A very enjoyable morning it was. Great talking about the future of @verulamschool and the vision of @stalbanscityfc for the future and the students future selves in @Verulam6thForm Looking forwards to the next catch up in the Xmas holidays. #TheSaints #VerulamSchool #Education https://t.co/zGlg1JKOgG

Great to welcome the next gen of Y11 Scholar/Athletes into @Verulam6thForm today. In prep for the inaugural trials for our unique education programme with @SACFC_Academy combining three A-Levels / BTECs with top class football coaching. https://t.co/CHWwrCoh44

#edutwitter 
Ignorance as an excuse has expired. 
#endAfrohairdiscrimination https://t.co/hmpPOHjyWd
If you haven’t seen our Newsletter, written by students, for students check it out here 👇https://t.co/YD6fIGOcst #VerulamForLife https://t.co/bYOSHUA4FN

Well done to former student Harrison Smith who has signed a professional contract with Stevenage FC🙌🏻💙

#verulamforlife https://t.co/yzGlboKZNg
#HappyDiwali #InclusiveForLife #VerulamForLife https://t.co/qc4a7I7AzP

Claude 7H and Tyler 7P give Prayers for the World and Prayers for our School at the Annual Service of Thanksgiving and Dedication at St Albans Abbey #verulamforlife #compassionateforlife #team7 #abbeyservice https://t.co/jbtHwmYIdk

Very honoured and privileged to go to work today and take part in the Abbey Service at St Albans cathedral. Our boys, and 6th Form girls, were amazing! Both those who read and those in the congregation. What an utter joy! @StAlbansCath @StAlbansTourism @verulamschool https://t.co/SKtHORLbuT

urls.title: BBC - 1Xtra Future Figures 2022
urls.description: 1Xtra Future Figures 2022 - Making Black History Now

tweets.text:
Artist Kay Rufai @universalsouldbrand works with Black boys to improve their mental health and to tackle stereotypes, taking a relational approach to drive systemic change. Delighted to see he’s been recognised in @BBCR1's Future Figures list!⤵️
https://t.co/Ib4IFTq161 https://t.co/qhnMAvzG0P

First half term @verulamschool done ✔️ 
Lovely Abbey Service to finish. 
Now to enjoy half term 😀 
#VerulamForLife #InclusiveForLife #CompassionateForLife #stalban #reteacher #teamre https://t.co/H7iLIfEzmP

Happy half term from @verulamschool 
https://t.co/uGOGrptsPF https://t.co/IR4cPhu1pa
